text: Belonophora ongensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae.Dawson, Sally E. & Cheek, Martin Roy. 2000. Kew Bulletin 55: 75–76, f. 2, Belonophora ongensis It is native to Gabon and Cameroon.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Belonophora ongensis accessed 29 April 2014 Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==External links== * Cheek, M. & Cable, S. 2000. Belonophora ongensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. *World Checklist of Rubiaceae ongensis Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of Gabon Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Belonophora ongensis
